entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm this evening. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 8:01 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:01 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 8:01 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
